data.name: SharePoint & Office 365 Saturday Madrid 2020
data.description: SPS Events are FREE events held in different cities around the world, featuring sessions from influential and respected professionals around all (but not exclusively) topics around Microsoft 365 (Office 365, SharePoint, Power Platform, Windows, Exchange etc.) and Azure. Read more
